tosdr.case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
quoteText: REPEAT INFRINGER POLICY: It is Redbubbleâ€™s policy, in appropriate circumstances, to disable and/or terminate the accounts of users who repeatedly infringe or are repeatedly charged with infringing the copyrights, trademark rights, other intellectual property rights or publicity rights of others.
